House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05121
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE CONDUCT OF EDUCATIONAL FIELD TRIPS OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "EDUCATIONAL FIELD TRIP ACT", IMPOSING PENALTIES THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : " Educational Field Trips Act "
ABSTRACT : Penalizes any school official or teacher or responsible school personnel who violates the provisions of this Act with imprisonment from 1-2 years and a fine of not less than P100,000.00 but not more than P500,000.00.
